title: Odd ward skin interaction/Not in my inventory
body: I was given this ward from a hextech chest.  I decided to try and make it permanent to see if the name would stay in my inventory, but unfortunately I don't have any new ward in my inventory at all.  So not only is the name glitched, but it cant actually be used :/  I'd love to have the ward if anyone can help me out.

replies.body: There is a known issue at the moment with some ward skins not appearing in the selection screen.  I don't have an eta on a resolution for this, but I did look into this for you and confirmed the ward skin is on your account.  Hope that helps!
This just happened to me. Wasn't able to get a screen shot of The name of the ward. It was the ward I really wanted too haha. Just want to confirm it's still in my inventory
That is definitely reassuring, many thanks!
